ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We rescued Musa and all those who were with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We delivered Moses and every one with him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and We delivered Moses and his companions, all of them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then We brought the two parties closer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We saved Moosa and all those with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We saved Musa and all those with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We saved Musa and those with him, all of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We delivered Moses and those with him all together;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We saved Moses and those with him, every one;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We delivered Moses and all those who were with him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We delivered Musa and those with him together.

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We saved Musa (Moses) and all those with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and We saved Moses and those who were with him together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We saved Moses and those with him, all together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We saved Moses and those with him, all together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:65] And We delivered Moses and all those who were with him, by bringing them out of the sea while it was in the state mentioned [above].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We saved Moses and those with him, every one) from drowning;
